name: Pirates Vs Bees [ Backrooms !]
description:
This is a submission for the PERFECT SIMPLICITY Game Jam on Crayta. Requires Crayta to play.

Walk around pirate islands, jump around. avoid touching bees, and compete to see which one of you and your friends can find the most treasures in the time alloted. Will you find the hidden teleporter to the backrooms?

made as a team with santuse423 and chesse20 on crayta.

PLAY THE GAME HERE
